mapper.select: SELECT notice_seq, title, notice_yn, contents, user_id, read_cnt, reg_id, reg_dt, chg_id, chg_dt FROM notice
SELECT notice_seq, title, notice_yn, contents, user_id, read_cnt, reg_id, reg_dt, chg_id, chg_dt FROM notice WHERE (notice_seq = #{bno})
SELECT notice_seq, title, notice_yn, contents, user_id, read_cnt, reg_id, reg_dt, chg_id, chg_dt FROM notice WHERE notice_seq=#{notice_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice( title, notice_yn, contents, user_id, reg_id, reg_dt ) VALUES ( #{title}, 1, #{contents}, #{user_id}, #{user_id}, sysDate() )
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET title=#{title}, notice_yn=#{notice_yn}, contents=#{contents}, chg_dt=now() WHERE notice_seq=#{notice_seq}
